// Create a Securty Hub Client
$client = new Aws\SecurityHub\SecurityHubClient([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'version' => '2018-10-26',
    'region' => 'us-east-2'
]);

$awsAccounts = ['0123456789'];

try {
    $result = $client->deleteMembers([
        'AccountIds' => $awsAccounts,
    ]);
    var_dump($result);
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    echo $e->getMessage() . "\n";
}
